marklogic.body:
I went to a Junior Prom in another town. We didn't have a prom.
I wore pants. It was the most fabulous outfit ever. EVER! Black palazzo pants with tiny white polka dots. The top was a halter top - white with tiny black polka dots. And a jacket - back with white polka dots. When I had the jacket on, I looked like I was on my way to church. But when I took it Off? I looked hot. And from the back, it looked like I was topless. It cost me $35 at Orbachs (a store that closed before most of you were born).
Ten years later, a woman came up to me and told me she remembered my outfit, and had caused quite a stir.
My BF at the time (Hi Harry!) loved it. Of course he got stinking drunk and spent a good part of the prom tossing his cookies in the men's room.
Then we all went down the shore, at 4am, slept on the beach and had a great (but Cold) day. I have the pics in a box somewhere.
